alert.note: Alert for Elkhead and Park Mountains (Colorado) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS GrandJunction (Western Colorado and Eastern Utah)
info.headline: Winter Storm Warning issued January 04 at 3:22AM MST until January 06 at 11:00PM MST by NWS GrandJunction
info.description: ...WINTER STORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM 11 AM THIS MORNING TO 11 PM MST THURSDAY... * WHAT...Heavy snow. Total snow accumulations of 12 to 24 inches with locally higher amounts up to 3 feet. Winds could gust as high as 60 mph above timberline. * WHERE...Elkhead and Park Mountains. * WHEN...From 11 AM Tuesday to 11 PM MST Thursday. * IMPACTS...Travel will be very difficult to impossible. Areas of blowing snow will significantly reduce visibility. A detailed map of the snowfall can be found at: www.weather.gov/gjt/winter.
info.instruction: If you must travel, keep an extra flashlight, food, and water in your vehicle in case of an emergency. The latest road conditions for the state you are calling from can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.
